title: 820-00165-02 - Don't charge / Low Green Light
message:
The computer works fine without battery, but when i plug the battery the the computer start and shutdown (restart) in loop also dont hold the battery
I tried another battery (new) no lucky.
I tried new IO and Cable no lucky
I get very low green light.

C7112-13-14-17 = 8V

Q7155:
Pin 5: 8v
Pin 4: 1.1v
Pin 3: 8v
Pin 2: 8v
Pin 1: 8v

R7152: 8v
R7151: 5v

Q7130 With battery plugged without charger:
1 = 0
2-3-4 = 8v

I think my problem is C3080 (battery and chager plugged):
Pin 1: Drop 5 to 2 Loop
Pin 4: Drop 8 to 7 Loop
Pin 3: 4V
Pin 2: 4v





Did you guys have any idea?

Thank you

title: 820-00165-02 - Don't charge / Low Green Light
message: PPBUS without battery plugged in?

title: 820-00165-02 - Don't charge / Low Green Light
message: F7140 (PPBUS_G3H) Without battery 8v

title: 820-00165-02 - Don't charge / Low Green Light
message: I like the precision you gave. 8V.....no digits on you meter?
